justification: The candidate demonstrates leadership potential through their role as Business Development Manager, leading proposal processes and bid preparation, but lacks explicit large project leadership experience.
Relevant experience includes data analysis tools usage at Coca Cola and UNICOM experience which is valuable for data management projects.
Technical expertise is visible in skills like PowerBI, Excel, and Tableau but less apparent in enterprise data warehousing and solution architecture directly related to this role.
No explicit experience managing enterprise data warehouse projects, but demonstrates managing large projects in TBEA with international coordination.
Strong understanding of Agile and SCRUM methodologies isn't clearly presented in resume, which is a vital requirement.

requirements.criteria: Strong understanding of Agile and SCRUM methodologies
Experience in managing enterprise data warehouse projects

input.job_description:
Join **TechVentures Inc.** as a **Senior Project Manager** where you'll oversee the delivery of key data management and analytics projects. We are looking for an innovative leader who can set and uphold delivery standards, while managing cross-functional teams to achieve the highest levels of service excellence. Your expertise in pre-sales, solution architecture, and client relationship management will drive our expansion into new markets and optimize existing processes.

### Key Responsibilities:
- Lead and manage complex data analytics and management projects from inception through completion.
- Develop and implement quality and project management systems to align with organizational goals.
- Coordinate solutions architecture and pre-sales activities, including the preparation of RFPs and EOIs.
- Mentor and guide junior team members in professional development and project execution.
- Engage with clients to deliver tailored business solutions and improve customer satisfaction.
- Collaborate with other departments to identify improvement opportunities and streamline processes.

### Preferred Skills:
- Proficiency in data tools such as PowerBI, Oracle DV, and Tableau.
- Strong understanding of software development methodologies including Agile and SCRUM.
- Demonstrated ability to lead large technical teams and handle stakeholder communications effectively.
- Expertise in business intelligence implementation and enterprise data warehousing.

### Why Join Us?
- Opportunity to work on impactful projects with global reach.
- Collaborative and inclusive work environment.
- Continuous learning and professional development opportunities.

Become a part of a team that values integrity, excellence, and innovation, and help us redefine what's possible in the tech industry.
input.additional_info: Preferred universities include National University of Computer and Emerging Sciences in Pakistan and equivalent institutions. We offer relocation support for candidates based outside of the hiring city, subject to management approval. Skills are assessed through a combination of technical tests, project management case studies, and panel interviews consisting of departmental heads and HR representatives.
minimum_requirements: Strong understanding of Agile and SCRUM methodologies
Experience in managing enterprise data warehouse projects

details.executive_summary: Abdul Rehman Hasham is a skilled business professional with an MBA from Lahore University of Management Sciences, specializing in operations, sales, and marketing. He has demonstrated expertise in data analysis and project management through his roles in various organizations, including Coca Cola and UNICOM Corporation.

employment_history.details: Critically analyze the past 404 days of operations by using Excel and Power BI and performed Breakdown analysis and identified bottlenecks in the operations which were causing delays of 32150 minutes and proposed a plan to improve operations by 21%.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams and improved the customer service experience by 12%. Capitalized on previous relationships and closed new projects worth 32 million pkr. Used business and technical expertise to demonstrate the usefulness and efficiency of product offerings. Managed account relationships, contract negotiations, sales, pricing, billing and logistics. Using data analysis tools and techniques to create charts and dashboards to track and report progress. Lead planning, strategy, proposal process and bid preparation.

Executed World Bank project by the arrangement of resources locally and internationally by coordinating with China head office and also made contracts and negotiated with Hitachi-ABB power grid, SERGI France & Megger UK (212k USD) for the equipment procurement and service delivery. Nurtured relationship with the suppliers and negotiated best prices for the organization. Liaise with Finance department for the budgeting activities of new projects. Participated in bidding activities of ADB, WB and KE projects and negotiated contract terms.

Forecasted the demand of products for multiple projects which are to be imported from the EU and China by coordinating with clients and vendors to ensure the sustainability of the inventory. Managed the team of 25 persons independently to accomplish multiple projects within an allocated budget of 27.5 million by strategic sourcing and vendor management.
